com.paymill.services
Class SubscriptionService

java.lang.Object
  com.paymill.services.SubscriptionService

public class SubscriptionService
extends Object

The SubscriptionService is used to list, create, edit, delete and update PAYMILL Subscriptions.

Since:
3.0.0
Author:
Vassil Nikolov

Method Detail

list

public PaymillList<Subscription> list()
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Subscription objects.

Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Subscriptions and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Subscription> list(Integer count,
                                      Integer offset)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Subscription objects, overriding the default count and offset.

Parameters:
count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
offset - Integer to start from.
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Subscriptions and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Subscription> list(Subscription.Filter filter,
                                      Subscription.Order order)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Subscription objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied.

Parameters:
filter - Subscription.Filter or null
order - Subscription.Order or null
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Subscriptions and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Subscription> list(Subscription.Filter filter,
                                      Subscription.Order order,
                                      Integer count,
                                      Integer offset)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Subscription objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied, overriding the default count and offset.

Parameters:
filter - Subscription.Filter or null
order - Subscription.Order or null
count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
offset - Integer to start from.
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Subscriptions and their total count.

Parameters:
subscriptionId - The Id of an existing Subscription.
Returns:
Refreshed instance of the given Subscription.

create

public Subscription create(Subscription.Creator creator)
This function creates a Subscription. Use any of the static create methods in Subscription and include additional options.
Example:
 paymill.getSubscriptionService().create( Subscription.create( "pay_123", "offer_123" ).withClient( "client_123" ))
 paymill.getSubscriptionService().create( Subscription.create( "pay_123", "offer_123" ).withAmount( 100 )) overrides the amount of "offer_123" and sets it to 100 for this subscription

Parameters:
creator - see Subscription.Creator.
Returns:
the subscription.

create

public Subscription create(Payment payment,
                           Client client,
                           Offer offer,
                           Integer amount,
                           String currency,
                           Interval.PeriodWithChargeDay interval,
                           Date startAt,
                           String name,
                           Interval.Period periodOfValidity)
This function creates a Subscription between a Client and an Offer. A Client can have several Subscriptions to different Offers, but only one Subscription to the same Offer. The Clients is charged for each billing interval entered.
NOTE
As the Subscription create method has a lot of options, we recommend you to use a Subscription.Creator.

Parameters:
payment - A Payment used for charging.
client -
offer - An Offer to subscribe to. Mandatory only if amount, curreny and interval are not set
amount - Amount to be charged. Mandatory if offer is null.
currency - Currency in which to be charged. Mandatory if offer is null.
interval - Interval of charging. Mandatory if offer is null.
startAt - The date, when the subscription will start charging. If longer than 10 minutes in the future, a preauthorization will occur automatically to verify the payment.
name - A name for this subscription
periodOfValidity - if set, the subscription will expire after this period.
Returns:
the subscription.

create

public Subscription create(String paymentId,
                           String clientId,
                           String offerId,
                           Integer amount,
                           String currency,
                           Interval.PeriodWithChargeDay interval,
                           Date startAt,
                           String name,
                           Interval.Period periodOfValidity)
This function creates a Subscription between a Client and an Offer. A Client can have several Subscriptions to different Offers, but only one Subscription to the same Offer. The Clients is charged for each billing interval entered.
NOTE
As the Subscription create method has a lot of options, we recommend you to use a Subscription.Creator.

Parameters:
paymentId - A Payment used for charging.
clientId -
offerId - An Offer to subscribe to. Mandatory only if amount, curreny and interval are not set
amount - Amount to be charged. Mandatory if offer is null.
currency - Currency in which to be charged. Mandatory if offer is null.
interval - Interval of charging. Mandatory if offer is null.
startAt - The date, when the subscription will start charging. If longer than 10 minutes in the future, a preauthorization will occur automatically to verify the payment.
name - A name for this subscription
periodOfValidity - if set, the subscription will expire after this period.
Returns:
the subscription.

pause

public Subscription pause(Subscription subscription)
Temporary pauses a subscription.
NOTE
Pausing is permitted until one day (24 hours) before the next charge date.

Parameters:
subscription - the subscription
Returns:
the updated subscription

pause

public Subscription pause(String subscriptionId)
Temporary pauses a subscription.
NOTE
Pausing is permitted until one day (24 hours) before the next charge date.

Parameters:
subscriptionId - the Id of the subscription
Returns:
the updated subscription

unpause

public Subscription unpause(Subscription subscription)
Unpauses a subscription. Next charge will occur according to the defined interval.
NOTE
if the nextCaptureAt is the date of reactivation: a charge will happen
if the next_capture_at is in the past: it will be set to: reactivationdate + interval

IMPORTANT
An inactive subscription can reactivated within 13 month from the date of pausing. After this period, the subscription will expire and cannot be re-activated.

Parameters:
subscription - the subscription
Returns:
the updated subscription

unpause

public Subscription unpause(String subscriptionId)
Unpauses a subscription. Next charge will occur according to the defined interval.
NOTE
if the nextCaptureAt is the date of reactivation: a charge will happen
if the next_capture_at is in the past: it will be set to: reactivationdate + interval

IMPORTANT
An inactive subscription can reactivated within 13 month from the date of pausing. After this period, the subscription will expire and cannot be re-activated.

Parameters:
subscriptionId - the Id of the subscription
Returns:
the updated subscription

changeAmount

public Subscription changeAmount(String subscriptionId,
                                 Integer amount)
Changes the amount of a subscription. The new amount is valid until the end of the subscription. If you want to set a temporary one-time amount use changeAmountTemporary(String, Integer)

Parameters:
subscriptionId - the Id of the subscription.
amount - the new amount.
Returns:
the updated subscription.

changeAmount

public Subscription changeAmount(String subscriptionId,
                                 Integer amount,
                                 String currency,
                                 Interval.PeriodWithChargeDay interval)
Changes the amount of a subscription. The new amount is valid until the end of the subscription. If you want to set a temporary one-time amount use changeAmountTemporary(String, Integer)

Parameters:
subscriptionId - the Id of the subscription.
amount - the new amount.
currency - optionally, a new currency or null.
interval - optionally, a new interval or null.
Returns:
the updated subscription.

changeAmountTemporary

public Subscription changeAmountTemporary(Subscription subscription,
                                          Integer amount)
Changes the amount of a subscription. The new amount is valid one-time only after which the original subscription amount will be charged again. If you want to permanently change the amount use changeAmount(String, Integer) .

Parameters:
subscription - the subscription.
amount - the new amount.
Returns:
the updated subscription.

changeAmountTemporary

public Subscription changeAmountTemporary(String subscriptionId,
                                          Integer amount)
Changes the amount of a subscription. The new amount is valid one-time only after which the original subscription amount will be charged again. If you want to permanently change the amount use changeAmount(String, Integer) .

Parameters:
subscriptionId - the Id of the subscription.
amount - the new amount.
Returns:
the updated subscription.

changeOfferChangeCaptureDateAndRefund

public Subscription changeOfferChangeCaptureDateAndRefund(Subscription subscription,
                                                          Offer offer)
Change the offer of a subscription.
The plan will be changed immediately. The next_capture_at will change to the current date (immediately). A refund will be given if due.
If the new amount is higher than the old one, a pro-rata charge will occur. The next charge date is immediate i.e. the current date. If the new amount is less then the old one, a pro-rata refund will occur. The next charge date is immediate i.e. the current date.
IMPORTANT
Permitted up only until one day (24 hours) before the next charge date.

Parameters:
subscription - the subscription
offer - the new offer
Returns:
the updated subscription

changeOfferChangeCaptureDateAndRefund

public Subscription changeOfferChangeCaptureDateAndRefund(String subscription,
                                                          Offer offer)
Change the offer of a subscription.
The plan will be changed immediately. The next_capture_at will change to the current date (immediately). A refund will be given if due.
If the new amount is higher than the old one, a pro-rata charge will occur. The next charge date is immediate i.e. the current date. If the new amount is less then the old one, a pro-rata refund will occur. The next charge date is immediate i.e. the current date.
IMPORTANT
Permitted up only until one day (24 hours) before the next charge date.

Parameters:
subscription - the subscription
offer - the new offer
Returns:
the updated subscription

changeOfferKeepCaptureDateAndRefund

public Subscription changeOfferKeepCaptureDateAndRefund(Subscription subscription,
                                                        Offer offer)
Change the offer of a subscription.
The plan will be changed immediately.The next_capture_at date will remain unchanged. A refund will be given if due.
If the new amount is higher than the old one, there will be no additional charge. The next charge date will not change. If the new amount is less then the old one, a refund happens. The next charge date will not change.
IMPORTANT
Permitted up only until one day (24 hours) before the next charge date.

Parameters:
subscription - the subscription
offer - the new offer
Returns:
the updated subscription

changeOfferKeepCaptureDateAndRefund

public Subscription changeOfferKeepCaptureDateAndRefund(String subscription,
                                                        Offer offer)
Change the offer of a subscription.
The plan will be changed immediately.The next_capture_at date will remain unchanged. A refund will be given if due.
If the new amount is higher than the old one, there will be no additional charge. The next charge date will not change. If the new amount is less then the old one, a refund happens. The next charge date will not change.
IMPORTANT
Permitted up only until one day (24 hours) before the next charge date.

Parameters:
subscription - the subscription
offer - the new offer
Returns:
the updated subscription

changeOfferKeepCaptureDateNoRefund

public Subscription changeOfferKeepCaptureDateNoRefund(Subscription subscription,
                                                       Offer offer)
Change the offer of a subscription.
the plan will be changed immediately. The next_capture_at date will remain unchanged. No refund will be given
IMPORTANT
Permitted up only until one day (24 hours) before the next charge date.

Parameters:
subscription - the subscription
offer - the new offer
Returns:
the updated subscription

delete

public Subscription delete(Subscription subscription)
This function removes an existing subscription. The subscription will be deleted and no pending transactions will be charged. Deleted subscriptions will not be displayed.

Parameters:
subscription - A Subscription with Id to be deleted.
Returns:
the deleted subscription.

delete

public Subscription delete(String subscriptionId)
This function removes an existing subscription. The subscription will be deleted and no pending transactions will be charged. Deleted subscriptions will not be displayed.

Parameters:
subscriptionId - Id of the Subscription, which has to be deleted.
Returns:
the deleted subscription.

cancel

public Subscription cancel(Subscription subscription)
This function cancels an existing subscription. The subscription will be directly terminated and no pending transactions will be charged.

Parameters:
subscription - A Subscription with Id to be canceled.
Returns:
the canceled subscription.

cancel

public Subscription cancel(String subscriptionId)
This function cancels an existing subscription. The subscription will be directly terminated and no pending transactions will be charged.

Parameters:
subscriptionId - Id of the Subscription, which has to be canceled.
Returns:
the canceled subscription.

update

public Subscription update(Subscription subscription)
Updates a subscription.Following fields will be updated:

  • interval (note, that nextCaptureAt will not change.)
  • currency
  • name
  • payment

      To update further properties of a subscription use following methods:

      • cancel(Subscription) to cancel
      • changeAmount(Subscription, Integer) to change the amount
      • changeOfferChangeCaptureDateAndRefund(Subscription, Offer) to change the offer.
      • changeOfferKeepCaptureDateAndRefund(Subscription, Offer) to change the offer.
      • changeOfferKeepCaptureDateNoRefund(Subscription, Offer) to change the offer.
      • endTrial(Subscription) to end the trial
      • limitValidity(String, com.paymill.models.Interval.Period) to limit the validity.
      • pause(Subscription) to pause
      • unlimitValidity(Subscription) to change the validity.
      • unpause(Subscription) to unpause.

          Parameters:
          subscription - A Subscription with Id to be updated.
          Returns:
          the updated subscription
